## IExecuteOperationsContext interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Context used for executing operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IExecuteOperationsContext extends ICreateOperationsContext 
```
**Extends:** [ICreateOperationsContext](./rush-lib.icreateoperationscontext.md)
